Reviews.Author: Theresa Ann Evans "Teri"
Reviews.Content: This television was so simple to hook up and so easy to manuever through the menus to adjust the picture and sound...I was amazed.The sound quality, like many have said, is more than adequate for an apartment, and sounds really good on low volume as well as turned up.  My other set you had to have the volume really loud. To catch low conversations in programs, I had to set the volume level at 40.  This one I can turn down to 7 at night and still hear every nuance without rattling the walls.  I live in an apartment building, so I try to keep the noise level down after 10:00pm but like to stay up late to watch tv.I was able to experiment with the zoom and the picture ratio very easily, and the picture quality is awesome.I am very, very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: So Far So Good
Reviews.Author: shadkat
Reviews.Content: So far I am fairly pleased with my purchase.  I looked around and around for a TV and read the reviews on several.  This one had mostly good reviews and a couple people wouldn't highly recommend it.  I decided to go for it, it was a cinch to set up, it's got a good picture, fairly easy to figure out the menu buttons, took me a minute to figure out how to view my DVD player on there, but finally got that, picture quality is good, extremely lightweight TV which is nice for a change, since this is my first "big screen" TV. I would buy again.  I definitely liked the price, I got the best price most definitely through Amazon.  I looked everywhere and was able to save $150 over regular price purchasing through Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Diana Beste
Reviews.Content: This TV is a great buy for the money. It's sleek and pretty, and the picture is very crisp. I enthusiastically recommend it!

Reviews.Title: A great Tv.
Reviews.Author: Alwyn Cadawallader "Hunter"
Reviews.Content: It is exactly what I was looking for.Setting up is simple and you get use to the control very quickly.Sad to say ,my amplifier does not have  optical audio input.

Reviews.Title: Solid TV!
Reviews.Author: Traveller
Reviews.Content: Good unit.  I was actually very surprised at how light these units have gotten over the years.  I mounted it on the Sanus pull out TV mount, and it went right onto the standard metal plate.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Arcy
Reviews.Content: Purchased to replace 37" SD TV in master bedroom.  After a lot of research I settled on the LG.  Best picture, all the features I wanted, great price. As suggested by other reviewers I will add a set of computer speakers to improve sound quality.  This TV is advertised as a 720p but it works at 1080p on my Directv HD receiver.  LG web site lists it at 1080p as well.

Reviews.Title: Do not purchase this product
Reviews.Author: Elwood
Reviews.Content: The LG 32LD350 is OK for as long as it lasts. The warranty is one year. About a month after the warranty expired, my LG 32LD350 began randomly turning itself on and off. Once it turned itself off, it could not be turned back on with the remote or the on-off button on the unit itself. The only way to turn it back on is to unplug it, wait for a minute or so, and then plug it into the power outlet again. But that only works for a few minutes and the problem re-appears. According to postings on various discussion boards, this is probably caused by a defective power supply or circuit board. I called LG customer service and the representative said it is likely a defective power supply, but because the problem occurred more than one year after the purchase date, there was nothing they would do for me. (The first LG service representative I spoke to said it was not a common problem. However, a quick internet search turns up plenty of discussion board posts identifying this problem.)During the year that I was able to use this television before it failed, I had to use two remotes: The LG remote control for volume and on-off (menu options), and the Comcast remote for channel changing. This model would not sync with the Comcast remote control for volume and on-off.

Reviews.Title: beautiful
Reviews.Author: Alison Mathias Wagner "ali"
Reviews.Content: this is a fabulous tv...esp for the price i payed..it was for my husband as a gift for father's day and i see him every night watching it...well worth it,,,,the seller was great...recieved it very quickly!

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Matt Overton
Reviews.Content: I got this to use in our bedroom. We had an old tube style TV and it was time for an update. This LG only goes up to 720P but it is fine for laying in bed and watching TV. I was not looking for a high-end product since we have another media room with a 50" TV. This gets the job done

Reviews.Title: Great Sound
Reviews.Author: SpaceKatJS
Reviews.Content: This tv has great sound and I like the number of ports available for inputting various electronics (i.e. HDMI, Component ports).

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: I can recommend it this product, because I have had it for more than a year and it work very well

Reviews.Title: Less than 3 years old and it's dead!
Reviews.Author: Debbie
Reviews.Content: I'm very upset that this TV lasted about 2 years and 10 months! The picture started to lock up and then it would do a slow fade until all grey. This lasted on and off over about 5 days and that was it. Dead. I've had older tvs that lasted 20 years, and now we get all this junk that doesn't last at all. I won't buy an LG again. The company said to take it to a repair shop, but that will probably cost more than getting a new one. Soooo disappointing.

Reviews.Title: GREAT FOR GAMING
Reviews.Author: Quasimoto
Reviews.Content: BOUGHT this for my arcade cab, works perfect.  NO lag on any fighting games, Looks fantastic would recommend to anyone that loves no lag gaming GG

Reviews.Title: Great shipping by Amazon but hard TV to set-up
Reviews.Author: Jaye
Reviews.Content: I don't know how Amazon does this, but they got this to me in two days!! They get five stars!  The TV is ok but I have never figured out how to adjust the aspect ratio. The picture is either too large to fit on the screen or too small. I've contacted my cable company and LG to no avail. I'm not a technology wizard I know but this is just another little frustration I don't need. I comes with a usless CD/Manual that was of no use.

Reviews.Title: Nice loooking
Reviews.Author: Karla C. Lemus
Reviews.Content: This was purchased a while back for a friends son. He really wanted a nice flat panel tv in his room. 32 inches did not sound as cool as his parents 46 inch tv but he was pleasantly surprised at how good it looked in his room. It's all relative to the sixe of your space and this one was perfect for his bedroom.

Reviews.Title: great picture, great price!
Reviews.Author: sarah
Reviews.Content: We purchased this tv nearly two years ago for the sitting area in our bedroom and it is still working great.  This is a "secondary television" on our DISH Network account, and with the setup we have can only be in SD.  However, the SD picture is very, very nice.

Reviews.Title: Great tv!
Reviews.Author: Maygem
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv years ago and it's still working perfectly! The definition is good and its just what I needed.

Reviews.Title: Looks Good
Reviews.Author: Martha
Reviews.Content: We bought this for a relative.  I recently went over to visit and the TV looks amazing.  The colors and textures are real nice, overall good quality.  They haven't had any problems with it  Will look at LG TVs when searching for TVs in the future.

Reviews.Title: Bedroom
Reviews.Author: Jamie R Peterson
Reviews.Content: We got this for our bedroom it was a sweet price and the right size and we have had it ober a year and never a min. worth of trouble

Reviews.Title: Works great.
Reviews.Author: Anthony Robert Medzi
Reviews.Content: Have had for a while now and no problems whatsoever. Great HDMI hookups and other capabilities, picture is clean as well.

Reviews.Title: LG 32 inch HDTV
Reviews.Author: Richard Raleigh Miller
Reviews.Content: This HDTV works great. I get all of the channels I am suppose to get. So the tuner is well built. The resolution and picture is great for a 720p at 60Hz TV. The HDTV has all of the features I wanted and a few more. I will purchase LG again. It does compare to some more expensive, more popular makers. I am pleasantly surprised with this purchase

Reviews.Title: Still running strong
Reviews.Author: N. Zielinski
Reviews.Content: Got this TV over a year ago to go in my bedroom. It's still working amazing. I mostly  use it for my xbox and it makes just about anything look great. If you need just a decent size tv for movies or gaming I highly recommend this guy.Only minor compliant is the sound can be a little annoying. Seems a bit quiet but I can easily overlook it and just turn the volume up.

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV and great price
Reviews.Author: J. Mcghee "V_RocKs"
Reviews.Content: I spent a lot of time in stores looking at dozens of HDTV's before settling on this one.My main reasons for buying:- Very clear picture even at 720 pixels. Because it is 32", 720 fits this TV very well!- Crisp picture without the fuzzies. Dozens of high end big name models have a fuzzy snow storm going on. You can't see it so much sitting 10 feet away, but when you walk up to them you can see a snow storm of pixels swirling. This TV and the Panasonic were the only ones without this problem.- Brightness is spot on. Great picture,colors, and blacks/whites. You can also switch between lighting conditions at the touch of a button... on the remote!- Sound quality. I was going to buy speakers and when I got home I found a setting to broaden the sound. I was wowed. No need for speakers, this thing actually sounds awesome!- LG is a good company on the move. They are trying hard to be the best in every industry they are entering. I needed some customer service and had my issues dealt with in one call. Very happy with their customer service!If you are looking for an HDTV at an entry level price with all of the features of the big boys this is the TV. If you didn't tell people it was 720p they wouldn't have the slightest clue. One of my friends who comes over for Monday Night Football was shocked when he saw the 720p on the bezel. For months he thought he was looking at 1080p. It truly does look that good!

Reviews.Title: Just got it in tonight
Reviews.Author: AustinBR
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for an early Christmas present for my bedroom and I am currently laying in bed watching it.  I mounted it to the wall and it is crystal clear from any angle I can see it from in my room.  I would recommend this TV to anyone.

Reviews.Title: One year later...
Reviews.Author: mka33
Reviews.Content: Like many others, I bought this unit at last year's black Friday specials. I'm not normally compelled to write reviews, but I must here. I only bought the LG because of the fantastic price I got (about $200 less than the current price!) but I must say it's the best t.v. purchase I've ever made. I have a Samsung 1080p, and the picture quality of this LG is at least as good! (For those of you shopping now, only blue-rays are actually 1080p. Your dvd's and "HD" cable/dish broadcasts are not 1080p, so if you can save money, buy 720p. Your eyes cannot tell the difference.) As far as the sound, get used to it kids, flat screens don't have the space or the inherent accoustics of a large-box old-fashioned t.v. The sound on this unit is 10 times better than on my big Samsung, which has pretty-much blown speakers after 2 years. The LG has twice the speaker output, more options and better, clearer speakers. Also, the LG has more inputs for component/composite stuff (like video games). But most importantly, now that it's out of warranty, it still works like brand new, unlike my first flat-screen, a Polaroid that expired about two days after the warranty! All in all, I love this t.v. And Amazon can't be beat!

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Jakeh
Reviews.Content: Great tv for the price. I am very pleased with this tv. Features are good. Picture quality is unbelievable! Sound is not that great in a big room.

Reviews.Title: Nice HD TV
Reviews.Author: N. Pugh "Nikki"
Reviews.Content: set up and connect was very simple, great picture.  The volume/sound is a little weak but not a deal breaker for us.  Enjoying this TV, especially the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: EJ
Reviews.Content: I purchased this during last year's black Friday deals. This was my first large purchase from Amazon and they delivered it perfectly - free shipping! I was little concerned about something so large being delivered but I trust Amazon wholeheartedly now. The TV was easy to set up. I had to tweak the picture to make the football games come alive. I am really impressed with the picture for the price. Football games are great but basketball games don't measure up as well. During bball games, the fast motions cause a slight blur around the players. I think this is common for LCDs and less-so for plasmas. But during football games the blur is not an issue. I love being able to see grass blades, pin stripes on suits, and the blemishes of people's faces. Even old movies from the 90s come through with a lot of clarity. I recently watched Waiting to Exhale (lol) and Whitney Houston's face was clear and bright. This TV made me a fan of LG. I recently purchased a 60 in plasma because of my great experience with this LCD. I intend to use it as my PC monitor in the near future.Currently hooked to ATT U-verse cable with HDMI cordSettings:Blacklight - 100Contrast - 85Brightness - 72Sharpness - 72Color - 67Tint - slightly greenColor Temp - CoolDynamic Contrast - HighDynamic Color - HighNoise Reduction - MediumGamma - HighBlack Level - LowEye Care - OnColor Gamut - Wide

Reviews.Title: Awesome Buy!
Reviews.Author: Tonester64 "Tonester64"
Reviews.Content: Approximately a year later and I can say buying this TV was worth the money.  Good resolution, nice size for my bedroom, easy to setup, HDMI ports, etc.  The only thing I wish for is better volume.  Even at near 50 the volume still seems a bit low.  I already knew about this shortcoming, but it's really not enough to stop me from buying unit.  I would recommend buying this unit.  However, if you do also buy some surround sound or speakers for it to project sound forward.  That's my next item to shop for.  Happy Labor Day.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good for the price!
Reviews.Author: Amit
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV 8 months back for $350 or so and I am happy with my decision. The picture quality is really good and it has all the features you can expect from a entry level LCD. The sound quality could have been better though. Overall it is a really good buy for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great LG TV!
Reviews.Author: Denise
Reviews.Content: This is a great LG TV!Pros-+Screen Quality+Features+HDCons--Power can be cut offFirst of all, the screen quality is pretty good. Yes, the SD could be better, but you can always change the ratio to the 4:3 format.The screen has hardly any glare, which is a plus.The power light at the bottom is NOT a big deal. If that light bothers you, then you aren't paying attention to the TV show. I never notice it while I'm watching TV. And no, there is not an option to turn the light off as far as I can see. But it is helpful to see if your tv is off or not.I don't like the Picture Wizard as much as I thought I would, but the Energy Saver is great! I have it on Medium, to have it OFF would be really too bright for me.SD is also good, on some things, it almost looks like HD. DVDs are almost Bluray quality, but not quite. Yes, when it is paused it doesn't look like a high quality picture, but why would you want to pause anything on this tv? Sports look pretty good, not really any blur, unless you try to look for it.Now, the bad. The power can shut off to this thing! The way mine is set up, if the cord is like, bothered or something, it won't receive power. Granted, we aren't back there often, but we don't try to rotate it too much.Overall 4 stars out of 5. Great LG TV!

Reviews.Title: A Gift I wish I would have kept :(
Reviews.Author: Russell A. Comer
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a laptop monitor for home and use a wireless keyboard and mouse to work on. As well as a TV and security monitor but that's another story.Hook it up and used it for a short time simply because we gave a Sony Wega 24" flat cathode television we had for many years away to our mother-in-law we thought would benefit from the larger screen only to have that loyal Sony go out on her :( So instead of buying another television for her we thought the New television was meant for her :)She has been using it without trouble and is really enjoying it. I have bought LG products before without fail and trust the brand, simply put a dollar spent should be a dollar invested. It's a winner in my opinion will buy another :)

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly Good
Reviews.Author: GalvezGuy "Weekend construction dude"
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace another LCD TV that simply died on me.  I figured replacement would leave me happier than repair.  First, I was very surprised by the HD picture quality.  At 720p I did not expect this to be as sharp and defined as it was.  The other great thing was the ease of setup, a lot of new televisions will frustrate you with the setup required, but this was pretty much plug and play.  I am not a huge A/V person, but I think that this was a great bargain and the quality was much better than I expected.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be more delighted
Reviews.Author: RickMD
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV from Amazon simply because my old Phillips 27" was giving up the ghost.  Being a single, professional male I don't have a lot of time for watching TV and don't have the inclination to play with "bells and whistles".  I've got a PC and a smart phone and don't play video games.  I just wanted a TV to watch on occasion and the price looked right on this one.  I'm pleasantly surprised.  The picture quality even at 720p is amazing.  Most people walking into my home assume this is a $700 set.  When my girlfriend saw it, she ordered one the same evening.If you feel you need four HDMI inputs, access for three simultaneous video consoles, and are a "vidiot" this is not the set for you.  If you want a beautiful picture with great color saturation and incredible sharpness (get hi-definition from your cable or satellite provider) this is the best set on the market for the money today.  I've found LG is hard to beat, set up is a breeze, and the remote controls are easy to use and intuitive.  Amazon delivered it for free in two days...

Reviews.Title: Good TV for bedroom
Reviews.Author: Andrew Baker
Reviews.Content: I wasn't expecting much out of this TV.  I just wanted something that was a good value for my bedroom.  This TV works well as a second TV.  The picture is adequate with only 60 Hz refresh.  The contrast is low.  For a TV to fall asleep to, it works fine.

Reviews.Title: Happy customer
Reviews.Author: Uska
Reviews.Content: Got the 32" LG TV in Feb 11 for my bedroom. Still happy with my purchase. Size is perfect, picture is clear, very easy to use. Also got 42" LG TV for my livingroom.  Could not be happier. Amazon shipping time was 5 - 7 days. Had my TV in 3 days.Great service Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV!!
Reviews.Author: T "Tiz"
Reviews.Content: This TV is amazing. Definitely the best possible value in its price range. For one, its incredibly user-friendly. Everything on here is so easy to use. Particularly changing the picture ratio. Seems like every channel and program is broadcast in a different aspect ratio these days. The remote has a simple, one-button way to switch between ratios. I LOVE that, no navigating thru menus. Also, when you watch in 4:3, it gives you black borders on the sides, some tv's do gray. The picture is pretty amazing. Other than being 720 instead of 1080, its pretty much top notch. Both HD and Standard def programming look very clear. Very vibrant. Speakers are more than good. Theres SOME bass, and plenty of sound. Volume meter goes 0-100. I'm yet to pass 60, which is plenty loud. Overall a fantastic TV though, I would DEFINITELY recommend it to anyone looking to get TV under $500

Reviews.Title: Excellent Quality for low price
Reviews.Author: Gryphons05
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV for our apartment around Thanksgiving when it went on sale and could not be happier! The picture quality is better than other name-brands, and despite reviews I read prior, the sound quality is fantastic! Best bang for your buck. In fact, we're looking to buy another LG for our bedroom, since we're so happy with our first purchase.

Reviews.Title: A GOOD TV FOR THE PRICE YOU PAY
Reviews.Author: Raj
Reviews.Content: WE ARE VERY SATISFIED WITH THE TV. WE ARE NOT EXPECTING A BETTER UNIT FOR THE PRICE WE PAY. MEET THE EXPECTATION.

Reviews.Title: LG32
Reviews.Author: nene01
Reviews.Content: It was not as easy as other TV's to do the initial set up. The sound quality could be better.

Reviews.Title: LG 32Ld350 32 inch 720p
Reviews.Author: TF
Reviews.Content: This tv is so far doing a great job I have it hooked up to a dvd player and stereo and it rocks I plan to hook it up to a pc using hdmi for streaming online movies and will keep you posted thanks to Electronic Expo for fast and smooth service

Reviews.Title: Great gaming lcd
Reviews.Author: David C. Batarseh "dbatarse"
Reviews.Content: This tv is bright and has great white and decent almost blue blacks. No motion blur compared to my 40 toshiba. I played god of war 3 on this and it looked great but the shadows have a blue tint to them. At 32 720p will look like 1080p if you are siting 4 feet from it.

Reviews.Title: Worth It
Reviews.Author: Gerald F. Leonard
Reviews.Content: Great picture, easy to use and set up. Sound quality is okay for bedroom use. I wouldn't use this in a much larger room. But for a bedroom this is a very good set. Amazon had the best value and price for this set.

Reviews.Title: bottom line, great buy !
Reviews.Author: straight to the point
Reviews.Content: This tv is an awesome buy, especially at $299.  If your looking for a 32" look no further.Pros: picture quality with 70,000:1 contrast ratio, 3 HDMI, component input, computer input, 2" deep, and a matte screen instead of a glossy screen.  glossy screens suck!  in a well or even dimly light room a gloossy screen looks like a mirror.cons: none for me.  nevermind that it's 60hz and not 120hz or that it's 720p and not 1080p.  on a tv this small it is very difficult to notice the difference anyways.  besides, the tv has a 4ms response time so it is not that blurry.you can't go wrong with this tv.  at this price you could go with a vizio, westinghouse, phillips or whatever, but the picture quality won't be as good.  and that's the bottom line.

Reviews.Title: Best 32" HDTV for the price
Reviews.Author: Iroquois
Reviews.Content: You really can't go wrong with this TV. I have it hooked up to my XBOX with a surround sound system and it is awesome. Great picture quality, average sound, good amount of cable slots in the back. Awesome price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Mandy
Reviews.Content: I got this tv on sale for $299.99...free shipping. It was a steal! I've seen this in the store for over $350. Works great, good picture. I am very happy with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Quality-Excellent Value
Reviews.Author: John T. Thompson "John T."
Reviews.Content: We have enjoyed the LCD television now for five months. Easy to set-up with HDMI cable(not included). Picture is excellent. Only with it had more than two HDMI ports. Speakers average. No need for 1080i for a smaller room, picture excellent. Would definitely buy again....

Reviews.Title: cool and easy to use
Reviews.Author: david1990
Reviews.Content: i realy like this tv, its easy to use, it has a good sound quality, its very loud, nice picture, and it was cheap, i dont have no negative things to say about it yet, its a great tv, for the size and price, i recomend this to anybody, that are looking for bedroom size tv, its specialy good for gaming and movies. go for it

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: This is the second of this model I have except the one in my living room is larger. Great picture could't be happier.

Reviews.Title: LG 32 Inch LCD
Reviews.Author: numixradio
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV at Amazon for my 4 year old son's room. After turning it on and how impressive it looks and for the price, now I want it for my room. I fully recommend this TV to anyone and for the price you can't beat it.

Reviews.Title: Amazing for $309!!!!!!!Love L.G!
Reviews.Author: crazybargainshopper
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these T.V's for my  kids rooms. they look amazing and sound great! they look pretty good out of the box but my husband calibrated them and they look even better of course. Also can not beat Amazon's price of $309 with shipping!

Reviews.Title: Superb value!
Reviews.Author: Aditya Tagat "Speakers babayy"
Reviews.Content: Very satisfying! This TV has more than what you bargain for. Runs linux on a chip inside, it can probably be made to do everything your computer does. No problems at all.

Reviews.Title: great for price!!!
Reviews.Author: jhodges
Reviews.Content: Ordered this for my grandparents whos tv went out. Super clear picture and they love the tv. Great for price!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Maxine Howard
Reviews.Content: I am so happy with this purchase. Total value for my money. Picture quality is great, features numerous. The only down side to this TV is the sound. The volume is pretty low so I suggest using it with a complete home theater system to get the best sound effect.Definitely a great purchase for the price!!

Reviews.Title: Great product, great price
Reviews.Author: Ross Martin Merideth "lilmerideth80"
Reviews.Content: This TV is great!! The picture is outstanding, sound is quality, and the features are good. I have no complaints and would definitely recommend this and other LG televisions to other consumers.

Reviews.Title: late bloomer
Reviews.Author: ReRe
Reviews.Content: this is the first time i treated myself to something i really didn't need.did my homework in looking for a "modern t.v." but sensible in price-this t.v. is beautiful, clean lines,perfect size for me, beautiful picture-easy to put together-basically once hooked up -the t.v. set itself up regarding channels,time,color etc.  light as a feather and just wipe down with a special cloth included(no fancy cleaning stuff needed) i am 64 yrs old -kinds set in my ways -but so very happy i broke out!!!!  seriously thinking of a smaller one for my bedroom-happy shopping with amazon:)

Reviews.Title: Awesome Bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: Brent D. Tomayko "BT"
Reviews.Content: I got this to replace my bedroom TV and I'm very pleased.  The on-screen menus are visually pleasing and easy to use.  The picture quality is great and the tiny speakers aren't bad for their size.  I'm glad I went with this TV.

Reviews.Title: Good but lacks in an area
Reviews.Author: RT4278
Reviews.Content: Over for the price - pretty nice.  Picture looks very good and perfect for the bedroom.One thing I do not like is the automatic timer lack of features.  I like to automatic turn the tv on then off in 3-4 hours later - can't do it with this tv - max is 59 minutes time length.  I've looked all over and it's dissapointing this tv only has a maximum automatic timer at 59 minutes unless there are some other tricks I'm not seeing yet.  I have to manually set the sleep timer each night with this tv since the automatic timer is not very flexible.  My old tv had a automatic timer that worked well, but not this LG tv.Otherwise, nice tv for the money.  And it is not heavy or bulky either.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Steven
Reviews.Content: This Tv is very good- easy to set up easy operate- very good picture. Thank you for getting it to me so quickly.

Reviews.Title: Great Bang for your buck
Reviews.Author: Eli Cox
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price.Sound is good. Picture is great for a LCD. Went with the 720p because it was over $100 cheaper then the 1080i. and you can't tell the difference from my veiwing distance

Reviews.Title: LG 32LD350 32 inch 720p 60hz LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Reston, VA
Reviews.Content: Amazing shipping, SUPER fast and TV fits expectations.  Keep in mind shiny black does pick up a LOT of dust, otherwise, sleek, modern, nice design, very light, very thin, very good picture, added bonus is the sound is extremely crisp on this television.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV, worth the money
Reviews.Author: cruisades
Reviews.Content: Everything works like it is supposed to. The picture and sound quality are excellent. I would definately recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price!!!
Reviews.Author: MG
Reviews.Content: Came home from work to find our new TV with a hole in the side of the box...and the screen totally smashed. Immediately emailed Amazon and they arranged for a replacement within hours and we received the second one within two days. Amazon has great customer service...that is why I always buy from them. We love our new TV...the picture is amazing compared to our old one. Some have complained about the sound, but we have it in our entertainment center and it sounds great to us. Managed to buy it for only $309 which was a great value. We are very satisfied with our purchase!!!

Reviews.Title: First HDTV
Reviews.Author: S. Smith
Reviews.Content: I just received the LG 32LD350 32-Inch 720p 60 Hz LCD HDTVSold by: Amazon.com, LLC, and so far am very happy with it.  Set up was easy, I'm not a techie(?), so ease of set-up is critical for me.  Also, all the channels and what-not work, without having to call the cable company; whether this is a part of the TV tech I don't know, but I think all aspects of the purchase should be reviewed.  Arrived in 3 days of order from Amazon (free shipping!). Picture is great, have it set on Vivid, and it is Vivid!The Sound is fine!  It's not like a surround sound, of course, but definitely decent enough for me.  Better than expected, the sound is totally adequate.I bought this TV for my bedroom, size is fine, I view from about 10ft.  Hooked up my ancient RCA plugs DVD/VHS player, and picture is so much better,plus a cheapie surround sound, all work fine. Price was $309, down from like $450, which is what moved me to go ahead and BUY, after much consideration.  A 32" HD with all the features, etc for $300 is a good deal, if all works as it should. I'll update this review in a few months.I truly researched this TV, a friend has an LG and is happy with hers(larger model).  Models can vary within brands, one model great and another full of probs, but so far this one is fine.  The only reason I don't give this TV 5 stars is because the Owners DVD arrived cracked; plus, as happy as I am, it's not fantastic, and too soon to give  5 star review.  I was fortunately able to copy the DVD, even with the crack, but a replacement may not be available, only option to return the whole TV, which I will not do.  I chatted with Amazon,  they are trying to get me a replacement DVD, and offered tech help if needed, which isn't. I've been buying from Amazon from their beginning, when all they sold was books, and definitely give Amazon and their customer service 5 stars.  I left packaging feedback.I'm still tweaking, which is easy, the menu is easy to use, I'm very happy.  If the TV holds up, I definitely recommend, and will add a star if possible.4/28/2011I'm adding a star because after over a month my TV is doing great!  Highly recommend for a midsize TV.  I can turn the power usage down to low for late night falling asleep(we pretty much keep the TV on 24/7, what dopes!), I've hooked up my Sony 5.1 surround sound and am totally happy with this purchase. DVD's are outstanding. The menu is simple, pic is fine for a 32" 720p, sound is satisfactory w/out the surround sound.  If it holds up, I'll keep commenting.6/11Still holding up just fine! Added a cheapie LG Blu ray player for around $80, hooked up w/ HDMI, all works fine and dandy....DVD's are better, sharper, very satisfied.  Cust Svc isn't terrific, but haven't needed it except to ask about diff model/larger TV's.2/3/12....screen has developed a "stain" in the lower rt corner, encompassing about 1/4 of the total area.  It only shows up when the background is like sky or solid, light...but makes me think twice about whether I'll be buying an LG for my next big screen.  Stain is usually not visible, as background is usually not clear (sky, clouds, solid background), but it's there.Removing a starSvc Tech fixed prob before warranty ran out (barely made it), gave me an attitude about difficulty in "seeing" the stain, (What stain, I don't see anything)", replaced panel, but acted like I was maybe a little out of my mind for wanting the prob fixed at all.  Sure, I should wait till the warranty runs out and the prob gets really bad, then just buy a newer, bigger and more expensive LG TV, and leave the tech to more serious probs, like explosions.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: G. Godat
Reviews.Content: Great TV especially for the price. Excellent picture, decent sound but I use with a surround system so I really wasn't looking for great sound. Took longet to get out of the box than it did to set up. LG makes a great HDTV!

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Mari
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for my parents to replace a 27 inch. regular TV.  It has excellent colors and was easy to follow when setting up. Some of the holes (first four) for the screws were a little hard to find when putting the base into the screen but it is almost fool proof.So far, so good.

Reviews.Title: Best TV I have ever owned!!
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: This is the first LCD TV I have purchased and all I can say is that I am impressed. After going to the store and looking at the actual TV I was officially sold. The set up was fast and easy and was enjoying the TV not 10 minutes after I opened the box. Some reviews state the TV has poor sound quality and states you need to turn it all the way up to hear the volume I could not disagree more. The TV is 10 feet from my couch and have to keep it on 8 out of who knows how high it goes and I can hear the sound perfect. The only thing that I can say that I don't like and is VERY minor is that my universal cable box remote is not able to control the TV.  I read some reviews stating thats happened to others but in all honestly the remote that comes with the TV is great and is perfectly designed with quick access buttons such as Input, Ratio and quick menu. And to Amazon thank you for the super fast free shipping. Item arrived 1 day ahead of schedule.

Reviews.Title: Great value but the component input was broken
Reviews.Author: GFo
Reviews.Content: Great product, great price.  I haven't had it long but it is exactly what I was looking for and easy to use.  I had narrowed it down to this and the equivalent Samsung 32", reviews were overwhelmingly positive for both.  The Samsung was reported to have substandard audio and it cost slightly more so I went with the LG.  I figured you can't go wrong with either, but the component input on the TV is broken.  I tried a different DVD player and different set of cables.  Probably not worth the hassle of shipping back, so I have to use the composite input until I get a DVD with HDMI out.  Another (minor) complaint is that the manual only comes on a CD.

Reviews.Title: LG 32LD350 Review
Reviews.Author: pnwbuyer
Reviews.Content: Good price, but TV didn't work upon delivery.  No picture and would not stay on.  Called LG toll free number - they sent repairman later the same week.  Quick fix - replaced computer board - no charge.  No problems since.  Very happy with picture and sound for price.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful TV at a GREAT price!!
Reviews.Author: Susan W. Sager "fancyface"
Reviews.Content: Update: I have owned my tv for over a year and keep it on 24/7 and it is still running smoothly. All in all very pleased with this tv. It stays on when I am sleeping also.I got my LG tv on sale from Walmart for $218.00. I paid $20 more for mine at Walmart plus $40 some dollars MORE for Sales Tax... I researched and AMAZON has a HUGE savings with FREE SHIPPING and NO SALES TAX of a savings of more then $60 BUCKS!!!!I decided to pick up two 32" tv's including the Phillips and LG models from Walmart. They were exactly the same price and I needed two and couldnt decide between them. The LG retailed for just $20 higher then the phillips but was on SALE and so they were the same price. Do your homework and you will see that Amazon has the best price and they also have great customer service with fast free shipping.I have always bought Phillips and have had no problems so I was unsure how I would like the LG. It looked slightly more appealing then the phillips, just slightly. I dont know why because they are both LCD and with the same demensions. I also own a Sharp LCD TV and love it just as well as I do both of these models! The price was about the same as the no name brand models which means years of more use.They have both been great LCD TV's so far! You may be curious on which one I like best. I like the LG better so far because of the better remote with more features plus sound boost which so far I have not been able to find with my other one. The picture quality is also slightly better. Its actually a perfect picture!!!! I hate having to compare the two because I do love my Phillips TV almost just as much but being that the both cost the same, then the LG is the way to go. Better picture with slightly more features.I also like the cute LG colored logo that pops up and moves accross the screen when your tv is in standby, which obviously no other LCD TV has!!The sound quality is great for me, not over the top. If you want something over the top then buy a surround sound to use with it or buy a different tv then both of these models. I am satisfied with the crisp sound and clear picture!!! There is also a neat technique where you can customize the image as to how you like it to be shown. The tv is really easy to use and opperate and it is a great value for the price paid. In the future if I have any problems then I will edit my review accordingly.I had no problems with the ease of use, besides the stand that came with the tv was slightly difficult for myself to put on but being a younger in experienced female maybe that was why I had the trouble. The stand that came with the phillips tv seemed slightly easier to install but still difficult for me to put on as well.It may not be important to many people but I also think that this LG has a better physical appearance then almost any other LCD TV I have ever seen! It is very stylish. It has been a great Television that I hope to enjoy for many years to come. :)The stand swivels and appears sturdy to me. I have a lot of cats and they have scared me twice by attacking the tv and it did NOT even fall... One of my cats was standing on it and slid down the screen.. Even with my wild rambunctious cats, the tv has not fell. I have been meaning to find a way to rope it but so far havent done it and I am thankful that the tv stand has held the tv as well as it has.Some have complained about the on and off light being too large. It is not really bright and there are no problems for me... I dont think of that as being a con. I did not notice it until I read a review on here which mentioned it. There may be away to turn it off and so if that bothers you, look into that on your menu.I loved that the tv was so quick and easy to set up the color and sharpness on the screen... Took a couple of minutes and helped you to set it up and turned out to be perfect now. I am still suprised at how well the clarity is on this tv. No matter where you put it the screen is just so beautiful and clear. You will notice so much more in the background when watching your favorite dvds, movies or shows then on some other lcd tvs that are the same price and size.The price of this tv has dropped dramatically in the past year so take advantage of the great deal Amazon is offering this tv!! It will cost about the same as a standard definition tv of the same size and lesser quality. Fantastic price!!!

Reviews.Title: Perfect Purchase!
Reviews.Author: haha
Reviews.Content: Picture perfect, sound nothing spectacular but good enough, easy to set up (the autoconfigure detects everything for you and spits out a perfect picture). The only inconvenience is the attachement of the stand.  You need a thin long screwdriver to set it up....the designer has all the tools around him or her and didn't think about the compact kit made nowadays for homeowners.  I also purchased a cheap HDMI cable on Amazon and connect it to my laptop.  It works like a charm.  The back is very well labelled and instructions for connections are very clear.  The HDMI on the side is very conveniently located.  Plug it in and voila!  For $309 and delivered free to my door from Amazon, in perfect condition....  What else can i expect?

Reviews.Title: I like LG tv's, my second one  bought
Reviews.Author: Okie from the handle
Reviews.Content: We now are the proud owners of LG LCD tv's.  The price is right.  It has the best quality picture in my opinion.We bought extended warranty for both, so we are just enjoying without a worry.Can't beat buying from Amazon.  The best price, free shipping to my door and no taxes.  We are very pleased and are enjoying our 42" and now 32" LG tv's.I highly recommend LG tvs.

Reviews.Title: For the price, EXCELLENT!!!
Reviews.Author: meatloaf921
Reviews.Content: Bedroom TV went out so just had to find something decent but not over the top.  While we were shopping, my wife suggested buying this one.  Picked this up because the price was right and I couldn't be happier.  With smaller LCD's you really don't need all the bells and whistles for a good picture.Pros:  The price, of course 2 weeks after I bought it the prices got lowered by $40 but still good nonetheless.  For 720p and 60Hz the picture is great!!!  Exceeded my expectations greatly.Cons:  Its the only thing getting turned on in the bedroom.Would I recommend to a friend?  YES!!!  If you're not getting a TV over 37", you do not necessarily need more than 60Hz or 720p, so save yourself the money and buy this one.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: allgoodinNC
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price. Just wanted a good TV to watch movies on. No problem with the set-up. I have a surround sound, so not sure about the build in speakers. Picture is really good. Just had to push a few buttons on the remote, and the picture was great. I do have an antenna, and it picked up all the channels that were available. It does take a couple of second before turning on, but I don't care.  It is in my living room and we watch from about 8 feet away. Will try the computer set-up next, so I can order Netflix. I love this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Great Price - even better with Price Match!!
Reviews.Author: Liz
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV, we needed a new TV and didn't want to pay the extra cost for the 1080 b/c we don't have HD channels and we watch far enough away that the "charts" said the difference was null.  So after some research, we chose the LG 32LD350.  Looks great, pretty easy to set-up (the stand gave me a little bit of struggle - but I won in the end), delivery was quick, and the price was right.  Bought it for 319 and found it on Walmart.com one week later for 309.  Easy as pie, filled out the info for price match and my $10 was credited.Overall, great product, great service!! Thanks!

Reviews.Title: LG Review
Reviews.Author: RANDY ORTIZ
Reviews.Content: This is a great television.  I would reccommend it to anyone.  It has supperior quality in picture and is sold at a very reasonable price.  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Nice little bar TV
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: This is a second TV for my rec room and hangs over the bar.  It's not a primary screen for watching movies so the 720p is fine.  It's lightweight for hanging on the wall.  Never turned on the speakers (have surrounds on the wall.)  To get a name brand for this price was appealing and I've been satisfied so far.

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: emcee
Reviews.Content: One of the better values in today's market for mid-size LCDs. The setup was easy and it worked right out of the box. Overall picture quality is very good, sound quality is acceptable, controls are easy to use. If you live in a crowded metropolitan area with high-rise buildings, even a $100 antenna doesn't bring in many stations, but the few that do come in HD show excellent color.  Bigger and more expensive LCDs have more features, but the LG 32 inch TV is a very good buy, especially for the $330 price.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, horrible sound
Reviews.Author: Nancy G.
Reviews.Content: My first HDTV. Took a lot of time to research and choose this one. 32inch size is perfect for my 876sq foot 1 bedroom apt. I bought it about 4 months ago. Picture is absolutely breathtaking-when viewing something in HD (such as off the blu-ray, or netflix streaming in HD, or cabel program in HD). If it's not coming through in HD (still about 50% of movies & programs out there), then the picture is like any old regular tv. The thinness and lightness of the TV is excellent. We bought 2 HD cables: one for the cable box and one for the Playstation 3. The wall mount we got at Ikea, saying it will work on any 32inch flatscreen, did NOT work on this TV (we got an experienced installer to tell us this). So we still don't have it hung up. The only bad thing about this tv is the sound- we have to play with the volume on every show and movie, and sometimes even multiple times within the same movie. IT's too loud at times, or not loud enough at other times. Over the past couple of months, this has become very annoying. Apparantly everyone these days uses some external, surround sound system with their HDTV, and that's why this is not an isue for them. But we are simple people who were relying on being able to use the speakers that came with the tv, but that's not working out well. At first I thought this an insignificant issue, but over time it's really dissapointing to pay about $450 for a TV that has such poor sound quality. I don't have any other HDTVs to compare it to, so I don't know if this is an issue with all of them.

Reviews.Title: Excellent on all accounts!
Reviews.Author: AMartin
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 15 year old son for Christmas. He is in heaven! It was shipped and arrived quickly dispite the blizzard we were under. He was able to set it up quickly and I haven't seen him since, so I assume he loves it. He uses it mostly for video games but he also plays music thru it so it has both great sound and definition, and since all video gaming now only requires 720p it turned out perfect for him. The price of course was amazing especially since it is an LG. I will probably be buying another very soon.

Reviews.Title: Joe
Reviews.Author: Joseph M. Grant "Joseph"
Reviews.Content: Have been looking for this TV for weeks and at the right price and found it at Amazon. The TV is top shelve ,picture is best out there. Have purchase many items from Amazon,and never had a problem. Items usaully arrive sooner then the givin date. Joe

Reviews.Title: Finally... A TV That Amazes Me!
Reviews.Author: Daniel Burke
Reviews.Content: Alas, I tried to go cheap, and as always, it didn't work out.  Having just returned a less expensive 32" TCL to Amazon, I paid a little bit more and ordered this LG instead.  What a difference!  The cheaper TV had dull, flat colors, poor contrast, and just generally failed to impress.The LG is fantastic!  Bright, vibrant colors seem to pop off the screen.  Even receiving network broadcasts with a pair of rabbit ears, the picture on this television is flawless.  I'm a picky consumer, and it's very seldom you'll hear me say this, but:"I'm 100% satisfied with this product - it's everything I expected it to be!"

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price.
Reviews.Author: Thomas A. Viteritto "Techguy119"
Reviews.Content: The TV arrived and was packaged good.I Would recommend this TV. It is also being used as a computer monitor and has an xbox hooked up. The only thing I have noticed when using the vga port the screen shifts slightly the right.On a regular monitor there are adjustments. I haven't found those adjustments on this TV but its really not and issue. I think it might just be the limit of the video card in the pc. The only improvement I think it needs is a better stand. They give you a screw that they would like you to screw the stand down to your entertainment center.(Not Happening)It current sits on a computer cart.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: rob eaton
Reviews.Content: I have no previous experience with the LG brand, or flat screen tv's in general, as this is my first hi-def tv. All my prior tv's (since the mid 1970's) have been Sony Trinitrons (the Cadillac of the TV world), so this LG had quite a hill to climb. This TV replaced a Sony 27" Trinitron monitor (at less than half the price I paid for the Sony, 21 years ago)After a couple of shipping issues which were adequately put to bed, the TV arrived, and within an hour it was set up and running. The old set weighed well over 125 pounds, this new tv weighs in at around 20 pounds. What a difference!! The picture is as bright and clear and colorful as the trinitron, and the images are sharper.It takes all of the older inputs (VCR, DVR) with no problem. This was one of my primary concerns, as we still use many VHS tapes and DVD's. The LG seems to upgrade the quality of the older media as it looks better than it did before. The non hi-def cable stations look pretty scratchy, but when run through the tuners on the vcr or dvr the picture clears up noticeably. The Hi-def cable stations look stunning. I can see a blu-ray in the near future, but for the things already in the library, this works great.I have not noticed (yet) any blurring or picture issues allegedly associated with the 720p v. 1080p. For our family's viewing, and the fact that it's a 32", this level of resolution will be fine. If I upgrade to a larger format, somewhere down the line, I'll get the 1080p.The sound is nearly as good as the Trinitron. Stereo is good and overall the sound is fine. If the film has really rollicking sound I want to hear really loud, I run it through the home stereo. Just as I had done with the Trinitron. I would buy this product (or one like it) again.

Reviews.Title: THERE IS NOTHING LIKE IT....
Reviews.Author: PRENEWGLOBAL
Reviews.Content: I WAS LOOKING FOR A VERY NICE 32 INCH HDTV UNTIL I STUMBLED AT THIS....ITS GOT AN EXCELLENT PICTURE QUALITY, SOUND IS AWESOME AND A SLEEK DESIGN....THERE IS NOTHING LIKE MY LG....I LOVE IT.

Reviews.Title: mi opinion
Reviews.Author: Aura Oropeza "v.t"
Reviews.Content: yo compre este producto de amazon y realmente me encanto. es como yo lo queria he imaginaba, con el inico problema que me llego sin la base para pararlo.todo me a funcionado a la perfeccion. lo recomiendo cien porciento

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: Amy M
Reviews.Content: I got this television for Christmas.  It was easy to put together, once I found a screw driver that is, and worked wonderfully when I turned it on.  The picture on this thing is amazing.  I was worried about how the sound would be considering it seems all these televisions have sound issues, but mine has had no problems!  Overall, I've been very pleased with this television and would recommend it to my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Great for what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Nilremwolf
Reviews.Content: We've just gotten this TV but we did the research beforehand and really scored a good one.  Though it doesn't have all the features I'd love to have in a TV, it's got everything that's important and a few things I didn't expect.  There's no internet connectivity and fewer hookups than I'd like, but I have those in the living room.  This is a bedroom replacement tv and it's perfect sized.  The picture's terrific and the sound seems to fill our wide bedroom.Going into Best Buy to compare, we found this one for $369 on sale, but I knew Walmart had it online for $309.  They price matched so we got a bargain.  One nice hidden feature is the ability to change picture ratio with a button on the remote.  Very nice when changing between sources or even channels for the best picture.  Menus are great, and LG has built a very good basic product here.

Reviews.Title: Well worth the $$!
Reviews.Author: topnotchtnt
Reviews.Content: I got this T.V. for a basement space where I would be working out to DVD's...all in all this thing packs a punch, and if you can get it for $320 like I did you will not regret it for a second... nice picture and sound and menus are easy to navigate through.  Highly recommended to those looking to purchase a 32-inch t.v... can't go wrong with LG!

Reviews.Title: First LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Strobble
Reviews.Content: I am cheap and the price of this TV was fluctuating between 329 and 369.. then i saw it for 311 and bought it right away.  Between the Toshiba , Samsung and this TV, I like everything better on this one, specially the picture quality.  Took me two months too finally lay down the money, I bought an articulating mount with it and have on my wall as my computer monitor/TV.  I watch movies right from my computer in high definition.  Perfect for my use.  Still working after one week.....  :)

Reviews.Title: Worth It
Reviews.Author: Ala58
Reviews.Content: Nice LCD TV for the price $329.00 My only complaint is the manual is on disc. I much rather have a hard copy and I don't want to be the one to print it. The setup would be easier with  a manual by your side. Other than that the TV is a nice value

Reviews.Title: Wow, what a deal
Reviews.Author: Bryan
Reviews.Content: I got this as a present to my wife and myself for Christmas for our bedroom. It was very easy to set-up and we have not had any issues. For the price, it is an unbelievable TV. It is only 720p, but for casual use in our bedroom it is fantastic. It was probably the same price as the 10 inch combo we got 15 years ago.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV with excellent price
Reviews.Author: Moises Porras "Moises Porras Gamboa"
Reviews.Content: This is the greatest item that I got in Amazon, I got it in a excellent price and the delivery was on time. The different in the  pixels is minimum you would not able to get the difference between 720p and 1080p, only if you are playing a very high video quality game maybe but with movies is the same.

Reviews.Title: LG 32LD350 32-Inch
Reviews.Author: twoods83
Reviews.Content: This tv is perfect for the bedroom and gaming. I would like to mention it is a 720p but its 1080p capable with a hdmi cord. Xbox 360 looks fantastic on this tv. Response time is perfect. I got this tv in used like new condition from Warehouse Central. And when the item arrived it was brand new. Whoever bought it first must have returned without even using it. Tv gets 4 1/2 star rating out 5!

Reviews.Title: Purchased for bedroom
Reviews.Author: D. Ritter
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv for my bedroom as I don't need a huge tv in the bedroom this works great. I ended up purchasing a bluray player with wifi built in since this tv doesn't have wifi built in to watch things like Netflix. This has been a great tv and arrived quickly and in new condition as described.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV!
Reviews.Author: Gary -Florida
Reviews.Content: My son wanted a HDTV for his bedroom. This was perfect for his needs. He was impressed with the picture quality and the sound was ok. He is a big gammer and playing the XBox on this certainly raised the level. He has told me even his DVD's look better on this TV, compared to the 40" TV in his family room.

Reviews.Title: Good TV, Excellent Value
Reviews.Author: R. Malloy
Reviews.Content: This is a good TV for the price. We bought it for our kids to play video games and they like it. The picture quality is good and we haven't noticed any issues with the sound. I would recommend this for a family room or bedroom, but probably not as your "main" TV. My only concern is I agree with some of the other reviewers that the stand is not the greatest and is not designed very well. But besides for that, we have been please with the product so far.

Reviews.Title: The Wife loves it!
Reviews.Author: JIM C "tifosi"
Reviews.Content: Ordered this TV for Christmas and it arrived really quick. In fact before the Wall Bracket and Component Shelf, so had to wait a week or so before installing it on bedroom wall. I have always been a SONY TV guy, so this was a first for the LG. I opened up and installed the stand and we used it on a TV table waiting for the wall components, and it was really great to view HD Channels and DVD movies, after viewing an old 32" Sony XBR CRT for years. It is connected to Satellite and drives the Wife's VCR and DVD player. She loves it! It was difficult to choose over the Sony Bravia 32", but comments and picture quality just didn't seem to be all that positive for the Sony compared to this LG. I am happy we selected this unit.

Reviews.Title: LG TV Review
Reviews.Author: Matthew E. McCue
Reviews.Content: Excellent TV for the price.  TV is a bit difficult to hear, but this could simply be due to the fact that it sits in an entertainment center versus a wall mount and the acoustics of the room.

Reviews.Title: 32 inch LG
Reviews.Author: prchal
Reviews.Content: priced right-delivered quick-set up easy-only thing, remote kind of funky poor design. Sony remotes are easier and laid out better.

Reviews.Title: A very good buy
Reviews.Author: Percolation Theory
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV to use as a television and a monitor, it works great for both.  Sharp picture during HD movies, gaming, and television.

Reviews.Title: great product- box arrived very damaged
Reviews.Author: Gloria
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with the television. Only downside was that we purchased this item as a christmas gift and the box was delivered very damaged. We were afraid that the contents might be broken. Thankfully they were not.

Reviews.Title: LG TV
Reviews.Author: Wayne Drumm
Reviews.Content: Works great, 32 inch kitchen tv as my wife spends most of her days there. Very good picture, alot better than the 19 inch Toshiba we had there before. Sound is also much better than the toshiba. The steady sound works well to tone down those annoyingly loud commercials

Reviews.Title: LG 32LD350 720p 60  Hz LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Maury Swoveland
Reviews.Content: I have been a loyal Samsung user until purchasing the LG 32LD350. I needed the ability to plug in a headset and chose the LG over the Samsung, for the features, price and reviews. I have been very happy with the LG LD350 since the purchase. I have used the television for about two months now and have had no problem. The picture is incredible! Controls are easy to use, and the hookup to my DirectTV receiver use quite easy. The picture is bright in any light and the tones and sound are very good. I would recommend this television to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Great product.  Great Vendor.
Reviews.Author: Terri Karius
Reviews.Content: This product was priced very reasonably ($328) and came two days prior to the estimated delivery time.  We were very pleased with the secure packaging, and we easily attached it to a Cheetah mount that we bought through Amazon  - also very cheaply.  While we still need to review the instruction disc that came with the TV to take advantage of its many features, we were still happy at how relatively easy it was to get started.  So far, none of our LG products have let us down.  Enjoy the television should you decide to purchase one.

Reviews.Title: LG 32LD350
Reviews.Author: JW
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV for my bedroom as a replacement for Toshiba Regeza that was less than 2yrs old and had the mainboard die.  The base requires a little assembly, but it i not difficult.  Overall the remote and menu functions are easy to use, which makes setup for the TV easy.  The picture quality out of the box is excellent for the price and being a 720P model.  The only thing I would fault is the sound quality.  Even though we have this TV in a bedroom we have to run the volume at 40% or above when watching HD stations off the antenna and we have to increase to above 50% when we switch to satellite stations.  This is our first LG TV and we have only had it for a few months, but overall we are very please and for the price I would purchase this TV again without hesitation.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Mark Papierski
Reviews.Content: Great product at a great price!  Black Friday pricing and free delivery greatly influenced our decision to purchase this TV before Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Great for bedroom use
Reviews.Author: C. Albanese "Chris A."
Reviews.Content: Replaced a 19" LCD with this model and wow, what a difference.  I get a nice picture in both HD and SD feeds, perfect for a normal size bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for an amazing price
Reviews.Author: Linda "lanash"
Reviews.Content: I love this TV! It gets an amazing picture, was easy to hook up and I got the best price through amazon. I did a lot of research and went to a local store to compare picture quality before I made my purchase. The LG definitely had the best picture. I got the 32 so it will fit inside my armoire and it looks great. I would recommend this TV to anyone who needs a 32 inch flat screen.

Reviews.Title: HI Def only way to go!
Reviews.Author: K. Heller
Reviews.Content: This is my first HD T.V. and I can't be happier. My old JVC CRT T.V. refused to die so I broke down because the prices have become so reasonable. I have a hi-def box so I now only watch channels in HD.  This pic is beautiful.  I am now disappointed when watching the standard channels, I have to adjust the picture and the sizing when I do that.  All in all a beautiful T.V. especially worth what I paid during the black Friday weekend.  You can't find the price today that I paid.  I purchased this from one of the vendors listed on Amazon who was cheaper than amazon and free shipping!You won't be sorry if you buy this model.  Its for my bedroom and its the perfect size for me, I couldn't go bigger unless I wanted to burn my eyes out.

Reviews.Title: Good for the Money
Reviews.Author: marshall bass
Reviews.Content: My only fault with this TV isthe closed captions show up in the middle of the screen blocking out the picture were as most TV it shows up on the top or bottom of the screen. The tv itself has quality pictture and sound. It is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: High Quality TV for Fantastic Price
Reviews.Author: AnimatedLegend
Reviews.Content: When the TV got to my house I couldn't wait to set it up. Screwing in the stand was a bit of a pain but after that setup was a breeze. I tweaked some of the settings a bit, then hooked up my laptop and ps3. Games looked incredible on it and the laptop was just as clear and vivid. The sound quality is great (I had a CRT before this TV which was fine but this one is 100x better). And you just can't beat this price...One amazing HDTV. I'd recommend this to anyone in a heart beat.

Reviews.Title: Really Good TV
Reviews.Author: Silence
Reviews.Content: I got my TV a few days ago and the picture quality is purrrfecttt!  It's a really good TV and I'm still impressed!

Reviews.Title: LG 32"
Reviews.Author: Paul Hadley
Reviews.Content: Great TV for what I wanted it for. I am using it as a monitor for my desktop.I looked around a lot and found this to be the best buy for a name brand 32" TV and had a high rating. It would also make a great 2nd TV for your home.

Reviews.Title: Quality TV
Reviews.Author: MacDaddy "Mac"
Reviews.Content: Bought for bedroom wall. Works well. Picture is good. I like 1080 better. Yes, I can see the difference. Great price at 326 just before Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Great tv but pc input is a dissapiointment
Reviews.Author: Garrett Dipilato
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv on amazon [...]. For the money this tv is great.It has a nice piano black finish and has a clean modern look to it. Setup was simple and i had the tv working in about 20 minutes. With 480i broadcast tv the picture quality isnt amazing but thats to be expected. When playing 480p resolution and up the picture is really good. at 1080i to me its almost comparable to blu ray if it is a good source like on an hd box. There are a ton of options to play around with and the menus are very easy to use. Sound is good but from factory sounds very flat. i turned up the treble and bass up a good amount and it really brightened up the sound. one main reason i bought this tv was to use it as a secondary pc monitor to watch netflix movies and play computer games. unfortunately little effort was put into this area. even at native resolution with a quality cable the picture is not centered and the picture is very blurry. text is pretty much impossible to read. luckily netflix shows and movies still look alright but surfing is not an option. also while viewing movies online there is alot of vertical tear. for now i guess its alright but i am very dissapointed. another reviewer said the same thing about the pc input. If you are looking for a tv and dont plan to use the pc input then this will be a great tv.

Reviews.Title: goood...but one complaint
Reviews.Author: qwerty
Reviews.Content: i like this tv, but one thing keeps on bothering me, the brightness.a lot of things look dark and its the tv. I bought two for Christmas. upon booting up my xbox 360, things look a bit dim. sure i can turn on the brightness setting and it will getting brighter, but thats not a good solution when things gets washed out a lot as a result. Movies sometimes look a bit dark to. I had a sony bravia for a year and it was much brighter than this without the washout. (though that tv is expensive.)I'm been messing around with the settings, its watchable, you can still play and watch anything, but i still think its on the dark side and it annoyed me. Something to consider when making your purchase...

Reviews.Title: LG 32" lcd
Reviews.Author: Gerald Feingold "busy buyer"
Reviews.Content: Our first LG product,and for the the first month's performance we are very pleased.  The set up and controls were very easy to operate.  The picture quality is what you would expect from fine tv.  As far as sound quality, it is adaquate.  You're not going to get big booming sound from any tv.  We have been dealing through Amazon for quite some time for many of our purchases and they have never disappointed us.  Kudos to Amazon and LG.

Reviews.Title: pleasently surprised
Reviews.Author: Dark Knight JPW
Reviews.Content: this is my first flat screen tv.  prior to this i did not want to buy a new tv I like my older crt.with that said i am happy with this tv.  the first time i plugged it in after an hour setup it worked wonderfully.  my faverite option was the optical sound out.  i have an older reciever that dose not have hdmi.  i have my dvd and pc hooked up to the tv and the sound is then routed back to the reciever.  makes things nice.

Reviews.Title: Happy customer
Reviews.Author: Robert Pritchard
Reviews.Content: So far so good it has a very good picture and easy to work wish it had a timer on it to auto turn off the TV other then that would buy another LG

Reviews.Title: I Love My New LG!!!!
Reviews.Author: Lesia123
Reviews.Content: I just received my LG last night and I LOVE IT!!!!!!!! Everything about it is Amazing. This is my first LCD and it is also my first LG product. I am so glad I waited for this product be in stock, it was definitely worth the wait!! AMAZON delivered in a timely manner and their customer support has been Great! I would recommend this TV to anyone who is looking to get High quality at a very Low price!! Thanks Amazon!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Better than I expected!
Reviews.Author: Leo Lady
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is great. I liked the set-up preference process - easy to do. It arrived when I was told it would and is a nice addition to my home.

Reviews.Title: nice TV
Reviews.Author: Raymond Baginski
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my mom and it arrived on time and the picture is good for the price. If she gets 5 years out of it, that would be great. She is 88 years young and watches it all day and night. So far it has been great!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV mainly for gaming and netflix. It looks good but make sure you have it hooked up to an HD source. There were no jagged edges in gaming and I am very happy overall with the picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Good Price
Reviews.Author: ScBy83
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome, inexpensive TV.  Excellent picture and sound.  Easy to set up and use.  The only  negative thing I would have to say is that the stand was a little tricky to figure out.  The directions don't really explain how to connect the pieces together.Other than that, I would definitely buy this again and recommend it to everyone.  Buy it today!

Reviews.Title: satisfaction review
Reviews.Author: Seamas
Reviews.Content: Very easy setup. No problems with initial delivery & setup. Picture & sound fine. Completely satisfied so far.

Reviews.Title: My son loves it.
Reviews.Author: Marjorie
Reviews.Content: Primarily purchased for gaming.  Have also used for TV and DVD watching.  Have had for less than 1 month. No problems so far.

Reviews.Title: best
Reviews.Author: idaho
Reviews.Content: This is the best lcd we have owned to date.Every feature is easy to use and well thought out.Excellant.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the price
Reviews.Author: P. Fleury
Reviews.Content: I bought this set as a secondary TV, for occasional use in the bedroom.  It does the job fine.  I have Time Warner TV service, and though I don't have a cable box in that room, the picture quality is surprisingly good - there is no noticeable difference between the standard TV local digital broadcast and the cable analog signal coming from TW.  Of course, it would be even better with an HD cable box.  Enough said.

Reviews.Title: The best TV I own
Reviews.Author: S. Creech
Reviews.Content: I originally bought a TCL brand TV (this one here: [...] ) but after having many issues with it, such as the component connection not working and constant flickering when connected to HDMI along with an incompatibility with a FiOS remote I decided to return the TV and buy this one instead.The picture is fantastic, even at 720p. Blacks are rich and colors are vibrant and there is limited motion blur when watching action movies or playing fast paced video games. The sound quality isn't absolutely phenomenal, but what can you expect without using a surround sound system? My next step is to get an HD box through FiOS and mount everything on the wall. The contours of the TV are aesthetically pleasing, along with the silver accent on the bottom. The TV is compatible with FiOS remote codes so everything is easy to use. My overall recommendation: If you plan on spending $280 on the other TV, you should do yourself the favor and buy this one instead for slightly more and avoid the problems.

Reviews.Title: My first flat screen, a solid TV
Reviews.Author: Andy
Reviews.Content: As one would expect, the picture is sharp, way sharper than the tube TV that's being used to prop it up.  The controls are very nice, but there could be some improvements to functionality, such as being able to sequence through favorite channels only instead of all channels.  Instant channel changing would be nice instead of a delay. The TV is an Energy Saver, which is very nice.  I looked at energy saver TVs first when buying.  The higher the energy saving setting, the lower the brightness essentially is what happens.  Maximum energy savings to me is unacceptably low brightness.  Medium isn't too bad in my usual low light condition.The sound is adequate.  To me, if I want superb sound, I can just plug in a sound system, which I may do eventually.  The sound output is only of the cable type 'optical audio'.  If you need to hook up your sound system make sure it has an optical audio input or look for an adapter to your sound system input type.  Adapters are apparently pretty inexpensive.Overall, I'm very pleased with it.  Setup is simple, picture is great to me, and sound is fine.  Energy saving is a great plus.  Oh, and 32" looks good for an average sized family room.  Bigger than that would be nice but not critical.-Andy

Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY LG!!!!
Reviews.Author: AJ5050
Reviews.Content: This was my first LCD TV and i LOVE it...i couldn't have asked for a better TV.. I have had it for a little over a month now and it has treated me well...I also loved how fast the product was shipped to me. I would recommend this product and this seller to anyone!Sincerely,Satisfied Customer

Reviews.Title: LG 32LD350
Reviews.Author: nomadrydr
Reviews.Content: After a lot of research, I FINALLY replaced the old CRT TV. Over several months, I would just stand and watch the wall of TVs in the stores, pick out the one with the best picture, and then go see what brand and model I thought had the best picture quality. 7 times it was LG. Just once was it another brand, Sony Bravia. Then came the I-net research. This LG had the features I was looking for. More than most in this class. Amazon had this LG for the same, or less, than TVs with less features or not-so-hot reviews. Ordered it at 12:30 p.m. and it was shipped {free, I might add} before 4 p.m.Out-of-the-box factory presets looked great. Played with the adjustments, and wound up back at the presets. The on-screen menu is simple and easy to use. The remote has one-button access to any adjustment needed more often. My one and only complaint? The 'level sound' that is SUPPOSED to keep the commercials from blaring isn't great. It helps, but it is far from consistent. I blame the advertisers more than the TV, but it doesn't work as labeled.Overall, 5 out of 5 for everything but the 'level sound'.

Reviews.Title: Why did I take so long???
Reviews.Author: B. Hartman
Reviews.Content: This is my first flat screen TV. I had been using a 19 inch old school TV for so long and my theory was "If it's not broke, don't buy a new one". Well the old school TV never did break down but I decided to take the plunge. Boy am I glad I did. Delivery was super fast and the picture is amazing.The only thing I didn't like was FedEx left the TV sitting in the hallway of my apartments. Luckily the Asst Manager lives next door to me and she called me when she noticed it hanging out in the hallway. It was Saturday and I was not home so she took it down to the office until I was able to pick it up. Just a heads up about FedEx. According to the Office Manager, FedEx is famous for that.

Reviews.Title: BUY THIS TV!!!
Reviews.Author: Cnallen3
Reviews.Content: I researched a lot of different TVs to find the right one and never considered buying it on Amazon. I narrowed down that I wanted either an LG or a Vizio and due to other reviews I decided on the LG. The picture is beautiful and it is perfect for my bedroom and/or my living room in my small apartment. I changed the picture color to vibrant and adjusted the zoom and i couldn't be happier!! I was going to wait until black friday or closer to Christmas for a better deal but once I discovered it was on Amazon for only $320 with no tax and shipping?! I couldn't turn it down!! And i might add that now that black friday has passed.. i made the right decision considering no one has this TV for that amazing of a price!! BUY THIS TV and you WONT be sorry!!!! I absolutely LOVE it :)

Reviews.Title: I Love this TV
Reviews.Author: K. Cross
Reviews.Content: We replaced a 15 year old CRT TV in our bedroom with this and WOW. I wish I had done this years ago ! The picture quality is amazing. The one thing that would make it better would be front facing speakers. I knew about this going in and am still very pleased.

Reviews.Title: An excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Sudhakar Parsi
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv from Amazon by 6Ave. Overall, this is an excellent TV. Has pretty good picture quality better than my previous Sharp LCD TV. It has got a lots of advanced options to adjust the picture quality.Only thing I could ask on this TV is, there is no hot button on the remote to directly access my laptop. I pretty much use it a monitor for my laptop to watch the online tv programs and movies. Every time, I need to switch from TV to Laptop, I have to go through all Input options and change it manually. My previous Sharp TV had a PC button on the Remote to easily access my laptop.Overall, its a Fantastic TV for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Starter HDTV
Reviews.Author: Sundown AL
Reviews.Content: Have been using this TV now for a while.  The picture is very good with many inputs and customization options.  I have also used Samsung LCD's of the same size and resolution.  Samsung's picture is definitely more vibrant than LG's.But LG was about $75 cheaper.  If you can spring for the extra $, definitely go with Samsung.  If money is an issue, go with the LG.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the price it is.
Reviews.Author: Florian Laplantif
Reviews.Content: I'm not one of those TV HD nerds who has to have the best quality picture, but I was pleasantly surprised with the sharpness of the picture for the price of this TV. The colors are bright and there's no glare or reflection. I watch this TV most of the time at a 45 degree angle from my desk in my small apartment so this is really nice.I have one of the new Apple TVs and the hookup was as simple as plugging in the HDMI cable into the TV and off you go. The sound is ok but I'm considering getting bigger speakers to have a little home theater setup. They lack bass somewhat but then again, most built-in TV speakers do :)

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: Mike in STL
Reviews.Content: The 32ld350 is a great bedroom tv. It took several tries to get the best quality picture. At the low $300 price point this tv has the most adjustments I have seen on a tv. I suggest you use the picture wizard to achieve the best picture.The only negative with this tv is the viewing angle. You don't have to get very far away from center and the picture is washed out. This is not an issue for my use but it would be a problem in a small living room or den if you tried to watch the tv from a chair a few feet off center of the tv. I have two Samsung LCD'S and while the viewing angle is limited it does not compare to how limited the LG is.The only reason I did not rate this tv with five stars was the viewing angle.

Reviews.Title: Great price and value
Reviews.Author: David Spyros "drspy"
Reviews.Content: Found this HDTV at Amazon.com for a great price, it was delivered ahead of schedule and works great!!! Excellent picture and features, looks good connected to our U-Verse HD service.

Reviews.Title: nice tv
Reviews.Author: Lindan
