Reviews.Content: Just got it a week ago and now I watch it every day. As an entry level HDTV from a name brand, I would say it does what it is supposed. Picture is good under HD channels. Haven't used a lot but will update it in the next few months.

Reviews.Title: No brainer this is a great HDTV.
Reviews.Author: EMAC7708
Reviews.Content: my t.v. arrived in one day the estimated time was 5 days. Plugged the television in and the picture was perfect with out adjusting the picture. Great price for a 32 inch HDTV love it, no problems as for know, but the CD manual does not work over all it is a perfect FIVE(5) LOVE YOU AMAZON.(1080p is what this T.V. is that is what makes it so GREAT!)

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the money
Reviews.Author: road king doug
Reviews.Content: For a TV to set on a desk and use in a bedroom this seems to be the perfect size and picture.

Reviews.Title: TV works great; excellent picture quality
Reviews.Author: K. Anderson
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for about a month now and it has not disappointed! It is pretty easy to use/figure out, and it didn't take much effort to set up. Great picture quality! What a great price for a name brand TV!

Reviews.Title: Nice bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: Rick L. Collins
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for our guest bedroom which has the secondary output from my Dish TV DVR. HD is not available in this room, and the connection is a coaxial SD, so I didn't want to pay extra money for 1080P resolution, and I needed one with a coaxial connection. This TV has a great picture, and the sound is better than most LCD TV's I have looked at. It also can be controlled by the Dish TV remote, unlike the TV I currently have in my master bedroom. I like it so much, that I plan to switch it for the one in the master bedroom. Good price too.

Reviews.Title: LG 32 inch HDTV
Reviews.Author: AnnMarie
Reviews.Content: We are very pleased with our television. One of the reasons we purchased it was because of the rating.  We are also very happy with the purchase price. We actually went to Walmart first to see if they would match the price and the salesman said no way.  Walmart claims that they will beat the price of any product if you can show them proof of the cost. In this case, the salesman would not budge. He refused to  consider even taking anything off at all. He said that he would not do it because it was an item listed on Amazon. Also, we had free shipping which was another plus.

Reviews.Title: Worth Every Penny!
Reviews.Author: S. Comm "Raconteur"
Reviews.Content: I love this LG!  Easy to use, crisp clear picture, better than average sound for TV speakers, such an improvement over my old CRT that I can't believe I waited this long.  A great deal!

Reviews.Title: Totally Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Olevia
Reviews.Content: This is my second LG TV, I purchased this tv for a small bedroom and it is perfect.  I am sold on LG televisions and highly recommend them to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Pleased
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: 1st HDTV and we are pleased.  Nothing too fancy but a great product for what we were looking for.  The picture and sound are great for the mid size room we use this tv in.  Menus are easy to navigate.  Sports look great and movies are very clear.  We would buy another LG TV in the future.

Reviews.Title: Great LG HDTV
Reviews.Author: J3lack
Reviews.Content: LG is a name i've come to trust for reliable displays that aren't going to break the bank.This HDTV works wonderfully with my computer, cable service, and x-box 360.When off it does have a red light that stays on.However, it's so dim that it's not even a drain on energy or irritant when i go to sleep.The sound is great, the picture is perfect, literally no complaints here. ^_^

Reviews.Title: great buy!!!!
Reviews.Author: darren
Reviews.Content: the LG 32LD350 is a great buy. if you're looking for a great quality television that easy on your wallet, than this is the one to buy. setting it up was a snap and fun too. great picture quality and great sound makes this TV an awesome for gaming. gamers wont have to worry about response time. do not regret buying this. i recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: great tv, bargain for the price
Reviews.Author: commander flatus
Reviews.Content: superb picture quality, nice size, i'm floored by how inexpensive this thing is, just a few years ago i bought a high-def crt the same size for almost $1k - this thing outperforms in every regard.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: Good entry level HDTV for the price. Standard Def DVDs look pretty good as well. The only thing I don't like so far is that there is no RCA audio out connection, only optical audio out. Not a big deal though.

Reviews.Title: Great investment
Reviews.Author: nvenga
Reviews.Content: This TV looks great!!! Easy to set up. The speakers are a bit weak, but they are ok. When I connected my Blu-Ray it read the TV as 1080p so I'm a bit confused, but regardless its a bang for the buck. Crystal clear picture, vivid, lifelike and simple. Definitely would buy again!

Reviews.Title: LG 32LD350 TV
Reviews.Author: LJS
Reviews.Content: purchased this for the spare bedroom... the TV picture is great, however not happy with the remote control which does not have a button for "sleep"; have to go into the menu and scroll to find sleep option...the power light is brignt red when turned off and it actually glows bright at night.overall i am happy with the price and the product.

Reviews.Title: DOA poor customer service
Reviews.Author: W. Karrow "car camper"
Reviews.Content: I did not buy on Amazon, I bought from another reputable vendor.  My item arrived DOA.  This review, unfortunately, is not of the product, it didn't work, and instead it is of LG's customer service department.For the last 15 years I have been responsible for acquiring technology goods and services for fortune 250 companies and I have seen DOAs repeatedly.  When my clients ask if they should return the DOA or damaged item to the vendor, I explain that due to the size of these items, the hassle of packing, wrapping, and shipping the DOA or defective item; and the possibility of having to wait for the item to be returned before a replacement product can be shipped (however, approximately 68% of the vendors I recommend will ship a replacement item prior to receiving the broken one)  (not sure what Amazon's policies are on this) they should always contact the manufacturer for service related issues. The manufacturer prefers to have you contact them; many even go so far to say "DO NOT RETURN PRODUCT TO STORE CALL TECHNICAL SUPPORT" (actual language).So, here comes the meat of my review, which is on LG's customer service department.  I firmly believe that the customer support you receive for a product is one of the most critical elements that needs to be considered when making a technology purchase.  And, when things go wrong with technology, as we all know they do, how the manufacturer responds will then be really important.I will now lay out the problems I had with LG customer/technical service.The item arrived DOA two weeks ago.  I called LG and told them that I had a DOA on my hands.  They said that they couldn't locate a repair facility in my location and that they would find one that could service my TV, then saying "this will take 3-5 days", day 5 came to a close without a peep from them so I called and was told, the first person I spoke with was wrong, it really takes 5-7 days to find a service center.  Now remember these 7 days is to have a "repair specialist" attempt to identify a service center that can fix the TV, they don't even have to be an LG dealer.  Considering that any one of us can use google and locate a repair facility, or at least identify that there are none that are either a) close, b) willing to perform a house call, or c) willing to work for LGs reduced rates.  To me, this whole process should NOT take 7 days.  It turns out that the average time is 3-5 according to a manager of the executive service department.  So.....here it is with 10 days gone by without me being able to watch my new TV.  I ended up contacting the company that sold me the TV and am returning it.So, in summation, LG makes fantastic products, I have many in my house and cabin; their customer and technical service department and policies are lacking.  If you are concerned about how long you will be without your TV if it fails under warranty think carefully before buying an LG.  This is not an isolated instance of poor service and/or non customer friendly policies. Below are two links to other individuals that had issues with LG service.  I only looked for 3 minutes, I am sure there are more out there.  LG gets high marks on most sites, but I am willing to bet that's due to the fact that DOAs are not common.http://www.amazon.com/review/R2I0GC8JIKN2SV/ref=cm_cr_pr_viewpnt#R2I0GC8JIKN2SVhttp://www.amazon.com/LG-32LH30-32-Inch-1080p-Gloss/product-reviews/B001V5J7OI/ref=cm_cr_pr_hist_1?ie=UTF8&showViewpoints;=0&filterBy;=addOneStar.

Reviews.Title: Stop working after 1 day
Reviews.Author: Ronen Hazan
Reviews.Content: It looks like a great TV. However, once we turn it off it was impossible to turn it on again

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a great price!
Reviews.Author: edlind
Reviews.Content: The LG 32LD350 TV had some great reviews and specifications, so I purchased one from Paul's TV through Amazon.com.  It was received on schedule and in good shape.  Set up was honestly a no-brainer...some people can make things such as setting up a TV as tough as they want it to be.The contrast ratio (70,000:1) is obvious by the clear picture; really a nice TV.  We have ours set up in our bedroom for a second TV and are truly pleased with it.  the size is perfect for a bedroom, but would be large enough for other rooms as well if desired.

Reviews.Title: LG 32LD350 32-Inch 720p
Reviews.Author: Luis Pérez
Reviews.Content: El TV llego en optimas condiciones, doy fe del cumplimiento en cuanto a tiempo y manejo de este equipo, recomiendo ampliamente esta vía

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: Jeepster
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture using outside antenna. Every bit as good as the Sony it replaces.Con: Volumn needs constant adjusting since speakers project to rear of screen.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: highroller4321
Reviews.Content: Nothing bad to say about the TV.  Great picture quaility for what it is and you can't beat the price!

Reviews.Title: Worth the money
Reviews.Author: poly
Reviews.Content: You can not find a better deal for a 32-in LCD TV, even though there might be some cheaper brand, such as Vizio.You should buy this one

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: hey
Reviews.Content: The tv is nice overall.  The picture isnt the best but is fantastic for the money.  I am pleased overall

Reviews.Title: Great, great, great!
Reviews.Author: madewade
Reviews.Content: This TV is great! The only issue I have had with it at all is finding channels. I live in an apartment and just get my cable through coax (no box or tuner or anything) and I'm working through those issues right now. But overall, wonderful TV. Easy to use, beautiful to watch. Great HD (and SD!) picture.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: jon busse
Reviews.Content: The TV is easy to set up and use.  Great picture and sound.  Read the positive reviews on Amazon.com as they are very accurate.Amazon's price is super.

Reviews.Title: European Power Cord
Reviews.Author: WellHurfMyDurf
Reviews.Content: LG 32LD350 32-Inch 720p 60 Hz LCD HDTV When I bought this TV I decided to buy it from Amazon so that I would not have to worry about it missing items or getting a used one instead of a new one. Boy was I surprised when it finally arrived. It was super easy to open the box, because it was not sealed! I opened the box and checked its contents. Whomever packed it into the box did a really shoddy job. On top of that parts were missing. A few of the screws for putting the stand for the TV together were missing and it didn't come with the correct power cord/power supply. Instead of coming with a cord/power supply that would actually supply power to TV it came with this European Power Cord for NoteBook, Non-Polarized, 6 ft. I looked at the cord, then the back of the TV, then the cord again, and finally the manual while cursing silently in my mind. I'm glad I opened it before I wrapped it.I bought this as a gift for Christmas and now its no longer in stock so I can't even get a new one to replace this one.Pro: Since I can't even turn it on I can say it literally uses no power what so ever. It is super energy star compliant.Cons: No gift for ChristmasI may just give it as a gift to some one I don't like as a gift instead.

Reviews.Title: Picture shortcomings
Reviews.Author: A. B. Abelow
Reviews.Content: After thoroughly researching the various 32" offerings, I decided on an LG, 720 p.  This is a bit of a disappointmnet, as the picture is not as sharp as I expected and the viewing from the side- tho done rarely- is quite faded and distorted. I also had great difficulty in attaching the screen portion to its base-  the instructions are inadequate.  Overall, I'm satisfied- but it should have been better for the price I paid.

Reviews.Title: Worked great for about four hours
Reviews.Author: brian
Reviews.Content: I hooked up everything to this TV by the owners manual, plugged it into a surge protector, programed everything and got it going.  It worked great for about four hours and then went dark - just like that.  All the other devices plugged into the surge protector are working just fine except the TV.  There was nothing going on at the time that should have caused this.  I called LG customer service.  They walked me through a few steps and determined that the TV has to be repaired.

Reviews.Title: As Advertised
Reviews.Author: DoubleDAZ
Reviews.Content: I don't go into great detail.  Most of you can read the product description, so I don't feel anything more than "it performs as advertised" needs to be written, especially if the item has been available for awhile.  This TV does exactly what I needed it to do at a price I could afford, so I am happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: My Results
Reviews.Author: jeff
Reviews.Content: My 32" LG was a great buy but i am in Afghanistan and have an Indian Satelite system and the signal is PAL and the US tvs do not use a PAL siganal and now the picture is black and white. In the US it would be the one to buy.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: sleepz
Reviews.Content: i love this product..alot of sellers on amazon dont fully list all the specs..thats the only draw back..sometimes its a little misleading..but i enjoy my tv very much quality  resolution . and the response speed..to future buyers. make sure you get what you pay for whane buying any electronic or anything for that matter...next day shipping was free..i was amazed at that great deal...i couldn't be more happier.

Reviews.Title: Terrible computer monitor
Reviews.Author: Obviouse
Reviews.Content: I bought this item solely for use as a computer monitor to replace an aging 22" screen. When I hooked it up through the computer VGA port, however, I was immediately taken back by the HORRIBLE display. It fails to map pixels 1:1, even when your computer is set to 720p resolution, the monitor's native resolution. As a result, all text on the screen is barely legible. After using the monitor for approximately 30 minutes, I had a serious headache. Furthermore, all black words and bold objects on the display were surrounded by a white halo, making it even worse. I attempted several different settings trying to fix either of these issues, but to no avail.Curious to know if this was going to be a problem with all LCD TV's being used with computers, I brought in my bedroom TV, a 42" LG 42LD450 model and plugged it in the exact same way. The picture was immediately perfect, clear and easily readable, even though I had to pan my head to see the entire screen because it was so large.The verdict? I have no idea whether this item works well as a TV, but as a computer monitor, it was an immediate return and is NOT recommended. I will be trying the 32LD450 model rather than this 32LD350 to see if that solves the issues.

Reviews.Title: Dead Pixel 22 days later
Reviews.Author: Christhopher Alvarado
Reviews.Content: Bueno primero que todo el televisor lo compre para jugar PS3 y conectar mi PC  Gamer a una pantalla mas grande porque la que uso es de 24 Pulgadas LED de ASUS la cual es 1080p y se ve genial, pero bueno al conectar mi PS3 al tv me quede atónito ya que la imagen en comparación a la de mi monitor LED ASUS 1080p es genial la imagen es casi la misma solo que en el monitor se ve un poco mas claro todo pero bueno eso porque mi monitor esta con una gamma alta y el TV no. pero la imagen genial y en mi casa tenemos un Samsung LCD de 52 pulgadas HD 1080  y bueno este LG compite con la imagen y me atrevo a decir que se me un poco mejor este LG, la calidad de imagen es muy buena y cristalina, y bueno en comparación al Sony Bravia X3 mi hermano tiene uno y la imagen es muy buena pero opaca por lo que al ver mi nuevo TV se quedo con la boca abierta no podía creer que la imagen era mejor que la de la Sony Bravia. Mi suegro tambien compro una pantalla de 32 pulgadas una Panasonic viera bueno que en realidad esta muy por debajo en la calidad de imagen de esta LG.Con respecto al Sonido, no me quejo ya que yo sabia que este TV no era algo Booom! que me votara del sofá con su sonido pero es bastante claro y nitido al jugar se escucha bastante bien pero bueno seria bueno comprar un sistema de audio por aparte si ya se quiere algo de mas fidelidad. Hasta el momento todo ha funcionado bien y les recomiendo el Televisor por imagen, prestaciones, presio, estética esta muy bueno espero les sea de útil mi review y espero actualizarlo en unos meses.22/12/2010Alerta Dead Pixel el dia de hoy Dead Pixel today I had a problem with the TV I got 1 Dead Pixel it is not a Stuck Pixel it is Dead Black dead pixel this really sucks estos apesta en realidad no pense que tuviera este problema a solo 22 dias de haberlo comprado I could not expect that I will have a dead pixel in this TV this really sucks!!!!

Reviews.Title: avoid lg tvs at all costs
Reviews.Author: randall hockenbroch
Reviews.Content: don;t buy lg tvs,they don't last,mine broke after only 2 years and lg did nothing to help,do yourself a favor and buy a name brand.
